attributes.action: begin a process to prosecute Tony Blair and Alastair Campbell for War Crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simple, really. For the disingenuous and apparently illegal invasion of Iraq, and the consequent death of many tens of thousands of wholly innocent men, women and children. These include Margaret Hassan, Ken Bigley and David Kelly, who's appalling deaths should never be forgotten.
